remarks: Lemma for ~ seqf1o .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:

seqf1olem.7 $e |- J = ( k e. ( M ... N ) |-> ( F ` if ( k < K , k , ( k + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
seqf1olem.8 $e |- K = ( `' F ` ( N + 1 ) ) $.
